requests.name: add article api v1
requests.rawModeData:
{
		"token":"{{token}}",
	    "title": "水电费",
	    "it_service": {{service_uuids}},
	    "tag": ["测试","随机"],
		"author": "随机",
		"ref_links": ["https://www.baidu.com"],
		"tasks": "测试插入",
		"type":"Troubleshooting",
		"content":{"description": "水电费", "analysis": "水电费", "solution": "前几天，我的邻居小伙伴突然在QQ上问我突然在不，她比我大几岁，平日里交集不算太多，这么冷不丁的来一句“在吗？”，让我误以为是骗子又来实施诈骗了",
		"workaround": "水电费"}
 	}

requests.name: add discussion 1
requests.rawModeData:
{
		"token":"{{token}}",
		"idcode":"{{article_id}}",
	    "dis_from": "zhang_san",
	    "dis_to[]": ["li_si","wang_wu"],
	     "content": "评论的测试内容水电费释放但",
		 "dis_type": "topic"
 	}

requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody);
tests["article found"] = jsonData.data.Count === 2
